S06bsu051_u:2_0_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane' nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme
S06bsu051_u:2_0_1: mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārthaṃ trayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ /
S06bsu051_u:2_1: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
S06bsu051_u:2_2_0: atha khalu bhagavān śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ
S06bsu051_u:2_2_1: pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmya pādau prakṣālya nyaṣīdatprajñapta evāsane paryaṅkamābhujya
S06bsu051_u:2_3: atha khalu saṃbahulā bhikṣavo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāman /
S06bsu051_u:2_4: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhirabhivandya bhagavantaṃ triṣpradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdan /
S06bsu051_u:3_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmān subhutistasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūtsaṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:3_1_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S06bsu051_u:3_1_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat -
S06bsu051_u:3_2: paramāścaryaṃ sugata, yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa /
S06bsu051_u:3_3: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadeva tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parīnditāḥ paramayā parīndanayā /
S06bsu051_u:3_4: tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam?
S06bsu051_u:4_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06bsu051_u:4_1: evametatsubhūte, evametadyathā vadasi / anuparigṛhītāstathāgatena bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parameṇānugraheṇa /
S06bsu051_u:4_3: tena hi subhūte śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S06bsu051_u:4_4: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te - yathā bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyaṃ yathā pratipattavyaṃ yathā cittaṃ pragrahītavyam /
S06bsu051_u:5_0_1: - yāvantaḥ subhūte sattvāḥ sattvadhātau sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītā aṇḍajā vā jarāyujā
S06bsu051_u:5_0_2: vā saṃsvedajā vā aupapādukā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino
S06bsu051_u:5_2: te ca mayā sarve 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:5_3: evamaparimāṇānapi sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu051_u:5_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta,
S06bsu051_u:5_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? na sa subhūte bodhisattvo vaktavyo yasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta,
S06bsu051_u:6_0: (Vajr, Vaidya 76) api tu khalu punaḥ subhute na bodhisattvena vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyam,
S06bsu051_u:6_4: evaṃ hi sūbhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet /
S06bsu051_u:6_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti,
S06bsu051_u:6_6: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇāmudgrahītum /
S06bsu051_u:6_7: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte sukaraṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:6_8: bhagavānāha - evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarāsu adha ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu samantāddaśasu dikṣu sukaramākāśasya pramāṇamudgrahītum? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:6_9: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo 'pratiṣṭhito dānaṃ dadāti,
S06bsu051_u:6_10: tasya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum /
S06bsu051_u:6_11: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena dānaṃ dātavyaṃ yathā na nimittasaṃjñāyāmapi pratitiṣṭhet /
S06bsu051_u:7_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:7_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā sā bhagavan lakṣaṇasaṃpattathāgatena bhāṣitā saivālakṣaṇasaṃpat /
S06bsu051_u:7_3: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat yāvatsubhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanmṛṣā,
S06bsu051_u:7_4: yāvadalakṣaṇasaṃpat tāvanna mṛṣeti hi lakṣaṇālakṣaṇatastathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:8_1: kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle vartamāne,
S06bsu051_u:8_3_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ paścime
S06bsu051_u:8_3_1: kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne guṇavantaḥ
S06bsu051_u:8_5: na khalu punaste subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:8_7: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitā anekabuddhaśatasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:8_8: ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu ekacittaprasādamapi pratilapsyante /
S06bsu051_u:8_12: sarve te subhūte aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:8_13: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmātmasaṃjñā pravartate,
S06bsu051_u:8_14: na sattvasaṃjñā, na jīvasaṃjñā, na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartate /
S06bsu051_u:8_15: nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravartate /
S06bsu051_u:8_16: evaṃ nādharmasaṃjñā / nāpi teṣāṃ subhūte saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā pravartate /
S06bsu051_u:8_17: tatkasya hetoḥ? sacetsubhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
S06bsu051_u:8_23: tatkasya hetoḥ? na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dharma udgrahītavyo nādharmaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:8_24: tasmādiyaṃ tathāgatena saṃdhāya vāgbhāṣitā - kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyamājānadbhidharmā eva prahātavyāḥ prāgevādharmā iti /
S06bsu051_u:9_0: punaraparaṃ bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte,
S06bsu051_u:9_2: kaścidvā dharmastathāgatena deśitaḥ? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu051_u:9_3: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirityabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:9_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo 'sau tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā,
S06bsu051_u:9_6: agrāhyaḥ so 'nabhilapyaḥ / na sa dharmo nādharmaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitā hyāryapudgalāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:10_0_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06bsu051_u:10_1: api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06bsu051_u:10_2: subhūtirāha - bahu bhagavan, bahu sugata sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt /
S06bsu051_u:10_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo 'sau bhagavan puṇyaskandhastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:10_6_0: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06bsu051_u:10_7: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo vistareṇa deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06bsu051_u:10_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06bsu051_u:10_11: tatkasya hetoḥ? buddhadharmā buddhadharmā iti subhūte abuddhadharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:11_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:11_1: na srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti /
S06bsu051_u:11_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sa bhagavan kaṃciddharmamāpannaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:11_3: tenocyate srotaāpanna iti / na rūpamāpanno na śabdān na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān dharmānāpannaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:11_4: tenocyate srotaāpanna iti / sacedbhagavan srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavet - mayā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptamiti,
S06bsu051_u:11_5: sa eva tasyātmagrāho bhavet, sattvagrāho jīvagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāho bhavediti /
S06bsu051_u:12_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sakṛdāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:12_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sa kaściddharmo yaḥ sakṛdāgāmitvamāpannaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:13_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayānāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:13_1: na anāgāmina evaṃ bhavati - mayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptamiti /
S06bsu051_u:13_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo 'nāgāmitvamāpannaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:14_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu arhata evaṃ bhavati - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:14_1: nārhata evaṃ bhavati - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti /
S06bsu051_u:14_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yo 'rhannāma /
S06bsu051_u:14_3: tenocyate - arhanniti / sacedbhagavan arhata evaṃ bhavet - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti,
S06bsu051_u:14_4: sa eva tasyātmagrāho bhavet, sattvagrāho jīvagrāhaḥ pudgalagrāho bhavet /
S06bsu051_u:14_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? ahamasmi bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena araṇāvihāriṇāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:14_7: na ca me bhagavannevaṃ bhavati - arhannasmyahaṃ vītarāga iti /
S06bsu051_u:14_8: sacenmama bhagavannevaṃ bhavet - mayā arhattvaṃ prāptamiti,
S06bsu051_u:14_9: na māṃ tathāgato vyākariṣyadaraṇāvihāriṇāmagryaḥ subhūtiḥ kulaputro na kvacidviharati,
S06bsu051_u:15_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhata - samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:15_1: nāsti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:16_0: bhagavānāha - yaḥ kaścitsubhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ kṣetravyūhān niṣpādayiṣyāmīti,
S06bsu051_u:16_1: sa vitathaṃ vadet / tatkasya hetoḥ? kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:16_2: tenocyante kṣetravyūhā iti / tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evamapratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyaṃ yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam /
S06bsu051_u:16_4: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyo yattasyaivaṃ rūpa ātmabhāvaḥ syāt tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:16_5: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu mahān sa ātmabhāvo bhavet? subhūtirāha - mahān sa bhagavān,
S06bsu051_u:16_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? ātmabhāva ātmabhāva iti bhagavan na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:16_8: tenocyata ātmabhāva iti / na hi bhagavan sa bhāvo nābhāvaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:17_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāstāvatya eva gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ? tāsu yā vālukāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:17_1: api nu tā bahvayo bhaveyuḥ? subhūtirāha - tā eva tāvadbhagavan bahvayo gaṅgānadyo bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu051_u:17_4_0: prativedayāmi te / yāvatyastāsu gaṅgānadīṣu vālukā bhaveyustāvato lokadhātūn kaścideva
S06bsu051_u:17_4_1: strī vā puruṣo vā saptaratnaparipurṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo
S06bsu051_u:17_5: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu sā strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt? subhūtirāha - bahu bhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:17_6: bahu sugata strī vā puruṣo vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam /
S06bsu051_u:17_7: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā tāvato lokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:17_8: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06bsu051_u:18_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe ito dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya bhāṣyeta vā saṃprakāśyeta vā,
S06bsu051_u:18_2: kaḥ punarvādo ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalasamāptaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:18_4: parameṇa te subhūte āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:18_5: tasmiṃśca subhūte pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:19_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ko nāma ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:19_1: kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - prajñāpāramitā nāmāyaṃ subhūte dharmaparyāyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:19_2: evaṃ cainaṃ dhāraya / tatkasya hetoḥ? yaiva subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
S06bsu051_u:20_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:21_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajaḥ kaccit,
S06bsu051_u:21_5: tenocyate pṛthivīraja iti / yo 'pyasau lokadhātustathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:22_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho draṣṭavyaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:22_2: Vaidya 80) draṣṭavyaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? yāni hi tāni bhagavan dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni tathāgatena bhāṣitāni,
S06bsu051_u:23_0: bhagavānāha - yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā dine dine gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
S06bsu051_u:23_2: yaśca ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhyaparebhyo deśayet saṃprakāśayet,
S06bsu051_u:24_2: paramāścaryaṃ sugata, yāvadayaṃ dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣito 'grayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya,
S06bsu051_u:24_5: na mayā bhagavan jātvevaṃrūpo dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:24_6: parameṇa te bhagavan āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:24_7: ye iha sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe śrutvā bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:24_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā caiṣā bhagavan bhūtasaṃjñā,
S06bsu051_u:25_0: na mama bhagavan āścaryaṃ yadahamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇamavakalpayāmi adhimucye /
S06bsu051_u:25_1: ye 'pi te bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
S06bsu051_u:25_2: ye imaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:25_5: api tu khalu punarbhagavan na teṣāmātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
S06bsu051_u:25_6: na sattvasaṃjñā na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā pravartiṣyate,
S06bsu051_u:25_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā sā bhagavan ātmasaṃjñā,
S06bsu051_u:25_10: saivāsaṃjñā / tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvasaṃjñāpagatā hi buddha bhagavantaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:26_2: ye iha subhūte sūtre bhāṣyamāṇe notrasiṣyanti na (Vajr,
S06bsu051_u:26_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? paramapāramiteyaṃ subhūte tathāgatena bhāṣitā yadutāpāramitā /
S06bsu051_u:26_5: yāṃ ca subhūte tathāgataḥ paramapāramitāṃ bhāṣate,
S06bsu051_u:27_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhute yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā,
S06bsu051_u:27_1: saiva apāramitā / tatkasya hetoḥ? yadā me subhūte kalirājā aṅgapratyaṅgamāṃsānyacchaitsīt,
S06bsu051_u:27_2: nāsīnme tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā vā sattvasaṃjñā vā jīvasaṃjñā vā pudgalasaṃjñā vā,
S06bsu051_u:27_3: nāpi me kācitsaṃjñā vā asaṃjñā vā babhūva /
S06bsu051_u:27_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? sacenme subhūte tasmin samaye ātmasaṃjñā abhaviṣyat,
S06bsu051_u:27_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? abhijānāmyahaṃ subhūte atīte 'dhvani pañca jātiśatāni yadahaṃ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūvam /
S06bsu051_u:27_10_0: na sattvasaṃjñā, na jīvasaṃjñā, na pudgalasaṃjñā babhūva / tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena
S06bsu051_u:27_10_1: mahāsattvena sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitavyam /
S06bsu051_u:27_17: tasmādeva tathāgato bhāṣate - apratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam /
S06bsu051_u:28_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena evaṃrūpo dānaparityāgaḥ kartavyaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya /
S06bsu051_u:28_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā caiṣā subhūte sattvasaṃjñā,
S06bsu051_u:28_2: saiva asaṃjñā / ya evaṃ te sarvasattvāstathāgatena bhāṣitāsta eva asattvāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:29_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yastathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito nidhyātaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:29_1: na tatra satyaṃ na mṛṣā / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo 'ndhakārapraviṣṭo na kiṃcidapi paśyet,
S06bsu051_u:29_2: evaṃ vastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati /
S06bsu051_u:29_3: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ prabhātāyāṃ rātrau sūrye 'bhyudgate nānavidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet,
S06bsu051_u:29_4: evamavastupatito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyo yo 'vastupatito dānaṃ parityajati /
S06bsu051_u:30_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:30_4: buddhāste tathāgatena / sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti pratigrahīṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:31_0: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā purvāhṇakālasamaye gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānātmabhāvān parityajet,
S06bsu051_u:32_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo 'tulyo 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:32_1: ayaṃ ca subhūte dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣito 'grayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya,
S06bsu051_u:32_3: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:32_7: buddhāste tathāgatena / sarve te subhūte sattvā aprameyeṇa puṇyaskandhenāṃ samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu051_u:32_9: sarve te subhūte sattvāḥ samāṃśena bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyanti vacayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti /
S06bsu051_u:32_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi śakyaṃ subhūte ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hīnādhimuktiakaiḥ sattvaiḥ śrotum,
S06bsu051_u:32_12: nābodhisattvapratijñai sattvaiḥ śakyamayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotuṃ vā udgrahītuṃ vā dhārayituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā /
S06bsu051_u:33_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yatra pṛthivīpradeśe idaṃ sūtraṃ prakaśayiṣyate,
S06bsu051_u:33_1: pūjanīyaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya /
S06bsu051_u:34_0: api tu ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:34_2: te paribhūtā bhaviṣyanti, suparibhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti / tatkasya hetoḥ? yāni ca teṣāṃ subhūte sattvānāṃ paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṛtānyapāyasaṃvartanīyāni,
S06bsu051_u:34_3: (Vajr, Vaidya 83) dṛṣṭa eva dharme paribhūtatayā tāni paurvajanmikānyaśubhāni karmāṇi kṣapayiṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:35_1: ārāgya na virāgitāḥ / yacca mayā subhūte te buddhā bhagavanta ārāgitāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:35_2_0: ārāgya na virāgitāḥ, yacca paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralopakāle
S06bsu051_u:35_2_1: vartamāne imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06bsu051_u:35_4: asya khalu punaḥ subhūte puṇyaskandhasyāntikādasau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu051_u:35_5: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭimamipi koṭiśatatamīmapi koṭiśatasahasratamīmapi koṭiniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi /
S06bsu051_u:35_6: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upaniṣadamapi yāvadaupamyamapi na kṣamate /
S06bsu051_u:36_0: sacetpunaḥ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā ahaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ bhāṣeyam,
S06bsu051_u:36_1: yāvatte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasmin samaye puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyanti,
S06bsu051_u:36_2: pratigrahīṣyanti, unmādaṃ sattvā anuprāpnuyuścittavikṣepaṃ vā gaccheyuḥ /
S06bsu051_u:36_3: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte acintyo 'tulyo 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:37_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sthātavyam,
S06bsu051_u:37_1_0: kathaṃ pratipattavyam, kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam? bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena
S06bsu051_u:37_1_1: evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - sarve sattvā mayā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:37_2: evaṃ sa sattvān parinirvāpya na kaścitsattvaḥ parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu051_u:37_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya sattvasaṃjñā pravarteta,
S06bsu051_u:37_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthito nāma /
S06bsu051_u:38_0_0: (Vajr, Vaidya 84) tatkiṃ manyase subhūte asti sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya
S06bsu051_u:38_1: nāsti sa bhagavan kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:38_3: evametat / nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:38_5: na māṃ dīpaṃkarastathāgato vyākariṣyat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti /
S06bsu051_u:38_6: yasmāttarhi subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:38_7: tasmādahaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatena vyākṛta - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha /
S06bsu051_u:38_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathāgata iti subhūte bhūtatathatāyā etadadhivacanam /
S06bsu051_u:38_12: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣa subhūte anutpādo yaḥ paramārthaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:38_13: yaḥ kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet - tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti,
S06bsu051_u:38_14: sa vitathaṃ vadet / abhyācakṣīta māṃ sa subhūte asatodgṛhītena /
S06bsu051_u:38_15: tatkasya hetoḥ -? nāsti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yastathāgatena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:38_16: yaśca subhūte tathāgatena dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddho deśito vā tatra na satyaṃ na mṛṣā /
S06bsu051_u:38_18: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmā iti subhūte adharmāstathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:39_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo bhavedupetakāyo mahākāyaḥ? āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - yo 'sau bhagavaṃstathāgatena puruṣo bhāṣita upetakāyo mahākāya iti,
S06bsu051_u:40_1: yo bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmiti,
S06bsu051_u:40_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? asti subhūte sa kaściddharmo yo bodhisattvo nāma? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:40_5: Vaidya 85) nāma / bhagavānāha - sattvāḥ sattvā iti subhūte asattvāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:40_6: tenocyante sattvā iti / tasmāttathāgato bhāṣate - nirātmānaḥ sarvadharmā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpudgalāḥ sarvadharmā iti /
S06bsu051_u:41_0: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattva evaṃ vadet - ahaṃ kṣetravyūhānniṣpādayiṣyāmīti,
S06bsu051_u:41_1: sa vitathaṃ vadet / tatkasya hetoḥ? kṣetravyūhāḥ kṣetravyūhā iti subhūte avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:42_0: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo nirātmāno dharmā nirātmāno dharmā ityadhimucyate,
S06bsu051_u:43_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - saṃvidyate tathāgatasya māṃsacakṣuḥ? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:43_2: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya divyaṃ cakṣuḥ? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:43_4: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya prajñācakṣuḥ? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:43_6: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya dharmacakṣuḥ? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:43_8: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte saṃvidyate tathāgatasya buddhacakṣuḥ? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:44_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:44_1: api nu tā vālukāstathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:44_3: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvatyo gaṅgāyāṃ mahānadyāṃ vālukāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:44_5: tāsu vā vālukāḥ, tāvantaśca lokadhātavo bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu051_u:44_8: bhagavānāha - yāvantaḥ subhūte teṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu051_u:44_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? cittadhārā cittadhāreti subhūte adhāraiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
S06bsu051_u:44_11: tenocyate cittadhāreti / tatkasya hetoḥ? atītaṃ subhūte cittaṃ nopalabhyate /
S06bsu051_u:45_0_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06bsu051_u:45_1: api nu (Vajr, Vaidya 86) sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt? subhūtirāha - bahu bhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:45_3: evametat / bahu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaḥkhyeyam /
S06bsu051_u:45_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? puṇyaskandhaḥ puṇyaskandha iti subhūte askandhaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /

S06bsu051_u:46_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:46_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpakāyapariniṣpattī rūpakāyapariniṣpattiriti bhagavan apariniṣpattireṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā /
S06bsu051_u:47_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavān /
S06bsu051_u:47_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaiṣā bhagavan lakṣaṇasaṃpattathāgatena bhāṣitā,
S06bsu051_u:48_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā dharmo deśita iti? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā dharmo deśita iti /
S06bsu051_u:48_1: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte evaṃ vadet - tathāgatena dharmo deśita iti,
S06bsu051_u:48_2: sa vitathaṃ vadet / abhyācakṣīta māṃ sa subhūte asatodgṛhītena /
S06bsu051_u:48_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? dharmadeśanā dharmadeśaneti subhūte nāsti sa kaściddharmo yo dharmadeśanā nāmopalabhyate /
S06bsu051_u:49_0_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavan kecitsattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate
S06bsu051_u:49_0_1: 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne,
S06bsu051_u:49_2: bhagavānāha - na te subhūte sattvā nāsattvāḥ /

S06bsu051_u:50_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu asti sa kaściddharmaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:50_1: yastathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ?@ āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /

S06bsu051_u:51_0: (Vajr, Vaidya 87) api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte samaḥ sa dharmo na tatra kaścidviṣamaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:51_2: nirātmatvena niḥsattvatvena nirjīvatvena niṣpudgalatvena samā sā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvaiḥ kuśalairdharmairabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu051_u:51_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? kuśalā dharmāḥ kuśalā dharmā iti subhūte adharmāścaiva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:52_0: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhute strī vā puruṣo vā yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumeravaḥ parvatarājānaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:52_1: tāvato rāśīn saptānāṃ ratnānāmabhisaṃhṛtya tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:52_2: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya parebhyo deśayet,
S06bsu051_u:52_3: asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu051_u:53_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati - mayā sattvāḥ parimocitā iti? na khalu punaḥ subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu051_u:53_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? nāsti subhūte kaścitsattvo yastathāgatena parimocitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:53_2: yadi punaḥ subhūte kaścitsattvo 'bhaviṣyadyastathāgatena parimocitaḥ syāt,
S06bsu051_u:53_5: ātmagrāha iti subhūte agrāha eṣa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:53_7: bālapṛthagjanā iti subhūte ajanā eva te tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:54_0: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu051_u:54_4: evametatsubhūte, evametadyathā vadasi / na lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:54_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? sacetpunaḥ subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgato draṣṭavyo 'bhaviṣyat,
S06bsu051_u:55_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata -
S06bsu051_u:56_0: ye māṃ rūpeṇa cādrākṣurye māṃ ghoṣeṇa cānvaguḥ /
S06bsu051_u:56_1: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtā na māṃ drakṣyanti te janāḥ // 1 //
S06bsu051_u:57_0: dharmato buddho draṣṭavyo dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:57_1: dharmatā ca na vijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum // 2 // 26 //
S06bsu051_u:58_0: (Vajr, Vaidya 88) tatkiṃ manyase subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā? na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu051_u:58_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte lakṣaṇasaṃpadā tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā syāt /
S06bsu051_u:58_2: na khalu punaste subhūte kaścidevaṃ vadet - bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñaptaḥ ucchedo veti /
S06bsu051_u:58_3: na khalu punaste subhūte evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu051_u:58_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? na bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaiḥ kasyaciddharmasya vināśaḥ prajñapto nocchedaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:59_0: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāṃllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:59_1: yaśca bodhisattvo nirātmakeṣvanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiṃ pratilabhate,
S06bsu051_u:59_3: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:59_4: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - nanu bhagavan bodhisattvena puṇyaskandhaḥ parigrahītavyaḥ? bhagavānāha - parigrahītavyaḥ subhūte no grahītavyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:60_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścidevaṃ vadet - tathāgato gacchati vā āgacchati vā tiṣṭhati vā niṣīdati vā,
S06bsu051_u:60_1: śayyāṃ vā kalpayati, na me subhūte (sa) bhāṣitasyārthamājānāti /
S06bsu051_u:60_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathāgata iti subhūte ucyate na kvacidgato na kutaścidāgataḥ /
S06bsu051_u:61_0: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanti trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau pṛthivīrajāṃsi,
S06bsu051_u:61_1: tāvatāṃ lokadhātūnāmevaṃrūpaṃ maṣiṃ kuryāt yāvadevamasaṃkhyeyena vīryeṇa tadyathāpi nāma paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:61_2: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusaṃcayo bhavet? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:61_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo 'sau bhagavan paramāṇusaṃcayastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:61_13: sa eva piṇḍagrāho (Vajr, Vaidya 89) 'bhaviṣyat / yaścaiva piṇḍagrāhastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ,
S06bsu051_u:61_15: tenocyate piṇḍagrāha iti / bhagavānāha - piṇḍagrāhaścaiva subhūte avyavahāro 'nabhilāpyaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:61_16: na sa dharmo nādharmaḥ / sa ca bālapṛthagjanairudgṛhītaḥ /
S06bsu051_u:62_0: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hi kaścitsubhūte evaṃ vadet - ātmadṛṣṭistathāgatena bhāṣitā,
S06bsu051_u:62_2: api nu sa subhūte samyagvadamāno vadet? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan,
S06bsu051_u:62_3: no hīdaṃ sugata, na samyagvadamāno vadet / tatkasya hetoḥ? yā sā bhagavan ātmadṛṣṭistathāgatena bhāṣitā,
S06bsu051_u:63_0: bhagavānāha - evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitena sarvadharmā jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ /
S06bsu051_u:63_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? dharmasaṃjñā dharmasaṃjñeti subhūte asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā /
S06bsu051_u:64_0: yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyāṃllokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhayaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu051_u:64_1: yaśca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāmudgṛhya dhārayeddeśayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt,
S06bsu051_u:65_1: svapnaṃ ca vidyudabhraṃ ca evaṃ draṣṭavya saṃskṛtam //
S06bsu051_u:67_1: sthavirasubhūtiste ca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāste ca bodhisattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
